snippet: Six days after surgery, Jeremy Lin said he nearly had full range of motion in his left knee, but a return to the Knicks is still a ways off.
abstract: New York Knicks point guard Jeremy Lin says he nearly has full range of motion in his left knee, six days after surgery, but a return to the Knicks is still a ways off.
lead_paragraph: Six days after surgery, Jeremy Lin said he nearly had full range of motion in his left knee, but a return to the Knicks is still a ways off.

headline.seo: Knicks’ Jeremy Lin Is Encouraged by Recovery
headline.main: Lin Is Happy With Recovery So Far
headline.print_headline: Lin Is Happy With Recovery So Far
